Sequence Information.Peptide Name: BTD-3 (theta-defensin-3, also PhTD3, PhTD-3, P. hamadryas theta-defensin-1; 3S=S, Cys-rich; XXC; UCBB1aB; natural AMPs; baboon, primates, mammals, animals; BBMM)
Sequence Information.Source: olive baboon,Papio anubisand blood leukocytes,Papio hamadryas
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Active against drug resistant C. albicans clinical isolates (MIC 12.5-25 ug/ml) (Basso et al., 2018).

Literature.Author: Garcia AE, Osapay G, Tran PA, Yuan J, Selsted ME.2008
Literature.Title: Isolation, synthesis, and antimicrobial activities of naturally occurring theta-defensin isoforms from baboon leukocytes.

Sequence Information.Comments: Discovery: Isolated from baboon leukocytes.Activity: Diffusion assays indicates activity against E. coli ML35, S. aureus 502a, and C. albicans 16820.
